did.head: Overview
did.unittitle: History of education in California : themes presented by the class in American education at Stanford University:
did.abstract: Anthology of writings by Monroe and other students, April and May, 1894 for Education II (American education), regarding education at various colleges and universities, higher education for women and minorities, and secondary schools.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Collection
scopecontent.p: Anthology of writings by Monroe and other students, April and May, 1894 for Education II (American education), regarding education at various colleges and universities, higher education for women and minorities, and secondary schools.
